item.description:
Okay, the votes are in! (Or, at least the emails are in.) And it seems that you guys really liked the Derry Dog Park, so before it gets too cold to be outside, we'll do that once again!

As a reminder, Molly & I will not be there, but we hope to to see you next month!


Thanks!

-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel November Meetup
